verses.verse: Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H430><s%>, O God: for man <S%H582><s%> would swallow me up <S%H7602><s%>; he fighting <S%H3898><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> oppresses me <S%H3905><s%>.
My enemies <S%H8324><s%> would daily <S%H3117><s%> swallow <S%H7602><s%> me up <S%H7227><s%>: for they be many that fight <S%H3898><s%> against me <S%H4791><s%>, O you most High.
What time <S%H3117><s%> I am afraid <S%H3372><s%>, I will trust in you <S%H982><s%>.

In God <S%H430><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, in God <S%H430><s%> I have put my trust <S%H982><s%>; I will not fear <S%H3372><s%> what flesh <S%H1320><s%> can do unto me <S%H6213><s%>.
Every day <S%H3117><s%> they bend <S%H6087><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>: all their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are against me for evil <S%H7451><s%>.
They gather themselves together <S%H1481><s%>, they hide <S%H6845><s%> themselves <S%H8104><s%>, they mark my steps <S%H6119><s%>, when they wait <S%H6960><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Shall they escape <S%H6405><s%> by iniquity <S%H205><s%>? in your anger <S%H639><s%> cast down <S%H3381><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>.
You tell <S%H5608><s%> my wanderings <S%H5112><s%>: put <S%H7760><s%> you my tears <S%H1832><s%> into your bottle <S%H4997><s%>: are they not in your book <S%H5612><s%>?
When <S%H3117><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto you <S%H341><s%>, then shall my enemies turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%>: this I know <S%H3045><s%>; for God is for me <S%H430><s%>.
In God <S%H430><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>: in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>.
In God <S%H430><s%> have I put my trust <S%H982><s%>: I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> what man <S%H120><s%> can do unto me <S%H6213><s%>.
Your vows <S%H5088><s%> are upon me <S%H430><s%>, O God: I will render <S%H7999><s%> praises unto you <S%H8426><s%>.

For you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>: will not you deliver my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling <S%H1762><s%>, that I may walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>?
